Song.title: Peace
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Bob Kauflin © 2009 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: G2 | G2 | C2 | C2 :||]
Chorus: [G2]Peace, You give me peace When the [C2]storms come and I’m afraid [G2]Peace, You give me peace When I [C2]trust in the words You say You give me [G2]peace [| G2]
Verse 1: [D] If You can [G/B]calm the sea [C] Then You can comfort [Em]me [D] If winds o[G/B]bey Your voice [C] Why should I fear their [Am7]noise? [D] And though my [G/B]eyes can’t see [Am7]I know [G/B]You’re [C]with [Dsus]me
Verse 2: [D] When someone [G/B]starts to fight [C] And does things I don’t [Em]like [D] I hear Your [G/B]gentle voice [C] Saying I have a [Am7]choice [D] To make an [G/B]enemy [Am7]Or to [G/B]spread [C]Your [Dsus]peace
Arrangement.searchtext: intro chorus peace you give me peace when the storms come and im afraid peace you give me peace when i trust in the words you say you give me peace verse 1 if you can calm the sea then you can comfort me if winds obey your voice why should i fear their noise and though my eyes cant see i know youre with me verse 2 when someone starts to fight and does things i dont like i hear your gentle voice saying i have a choice to make an enemy or to spread your peace
